tidbits.title: Land of Upright People
tidbits.description: Burkina Faso translates to 'Land of Upright People,' reflecting its citizens' strong sense of dignity, resilience, and communal values.

tidbits.title: Vibrant Arts and Culture
tidbits.description: Burkina Faso is known for its lively arts scene, featuring traditional music, dance (such as the energetic Balafon), and the renowned FESPACO film festival.

tidbits.title: Sahelian Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country is characterized by Sahelian landscapes, showcasing both savannah grasslands and the stunning Sindou Peaks in the Banfora region.
